column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////Someone recommended this place to us
column2: and we're glad to have checked it out! While it said dressy for dress code
column3: we were fine with our shorts and tshirts as we were unable to change beforehand
column4: and they didn't seem to mind. Reservations were full when I looked online
column5: but we arrived right at 5 and was able to get a table right away. We opted for the bar which fills up very quickly. We had an old fashioned and vodka martini which were delicious. We also had the oysters and melted goat cheese which were incredible. The service was top notch
column8: and inviting. I'd definitely return here!
